class.name: talon_controllers/TalonPercentOutputController
class.description: Configure and run a Talon SRX in percent output mode

class.name: talon_controllers/TalonFollowerController
class.description: Configure and run a Talon SRX in follower (slave) mode

class.name: talon_controllers/TalonPositionCloseLoopController
class.description: Configure and run a Talon SRX in position close loop (PIDF) mode

class.name: talon_controllers/TalonVelocityCloseLoopController
class.description: Configure and run a Talon SRX in velocity close loop (PIDF) mode

class.name: talon_controllers/TalonLinearPositionCloseLoopController
class.description: Configure and run a Talon SRX connected to a gear box for the elevator
